introductory_questions: Hello, I am an Interviewer of Gallup Research company and my name is [Name]. We carry out opinion polls on a variety of products and services. Today, we are talking to people about cigarettes. I would be grateful for your help. All the information you provide us will be kept strictly confidential. Thank you.
household_question: Would you please name all members of your household who are above the age of 21, starting with the oldest.
family_member_questions: Does he/she smoke more than 5 cigarettes per day
